title: A week after severe weather, Iowans feel abandoned
itunes:title: A week after severe weather, Iowans feel abandoned
description:
Vox explains the policies that make up the Democratic platform.

A news anchor from Iowa tells PBS NewsHour that many residents are still desperate for help, a week after severe weather tore through the state. And in an op-ed for Washington Post, a local newspaper columnist says Iowa has been abandoned by the national media.

USA Today breaks down the challenges facing this year’s census and why many experts are concerned about a historic undercount.
